<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get active organization for authenticated user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{realm}/users/active-organization"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the currently active organization for the authenticated user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"success","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"organizationId":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the active organization"},"organizationName":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the active organization"},"displayName":{"type":"string","description":"The display name of the active organization"},"roles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"User's roles in the active organization"},"switchedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the organization was last switched to"}},"title":"ActiveOrganizationRepresentation"}}}},"204":{"description":"No active organization set"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
